column4: How do I get to straight console mode with no X?  I was sure I used to use init 3.  init 1 won't work for installing the nvidia proprietary drivers.  Any hints?
you could always try booting into X, then going to a console (ctrl-alt-1) and then stopping gdm (sudo /etc/init.d/gdm stop)
otherwise, I always thought it was init 2
thanks, will give it a shot
